results.title: Effect of Aslagh Capsule, a Traditional Compound Herbal Product on Oligomenorrhea in Patients with Polycystic Ovary Syndrome: A Three-Arm, Open-label, Randomized, Controlled Trial
results.text_hl: Hence, the present investigation was designed to compare Aslagh capsule with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on the @<m>DISEASE_Oligomenorrhea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009839 @@@oligomenorrhea@@@.

results.title: Comparing the Effects of Agnugol and Metformin on Oligomenorrhea in Patients with Polycystic Ovary Syndrome: A Randomized Clinical Trial.
results.text_hl: Since @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ is a chemical drug with side effects, Agnugol can be presented as its herbal alternative to treat @<m>DISEASE_Oligomenorrhea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009839 @@@oligomenorrhea@@@.

citations.NLM: Shayan A, Masoumi SZ, Shobeiri F, Tohidi S, Khalili A. Comparing the Effects of Agnugol and Metformin on Oligomenorrhea in Patients with Polycystic Ovary Syndrome: A Randomized Clinical Trial. J Clin Diagn Res. 2016 Dec;10(12):QC13-QC16. PMID: 28208942

results.title: Early metformin therapy (age 8-12 years) in girls with precocious pubarche to reduce hirsutism, androgen excess, and oligomenorrhea in adolescence.
results.text_hl: Early @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy (age 8-12 years) in girls with @DISEASE_Hyperlexia @DISEASE_MESH:C565500 @@@precocious pubarche@@@ to reduce @DISEASE_Hirsutism @DISEASE_MESH:D006628 @@@hirsutism@@@, @DISEASE_Virilism @DISEASE_MESH:D014770 @@@androgen excess@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Oligomenorrhea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009839 @@@oligomenorrhea@@@ in adolescence.

results.title: The Effect of Metformin on the Endometrium of Women with Polycystic Ovary Syndrome.
results.text_hl: Ten of the @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ received no other medication (group A, control), while the remaining 10 received @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (group B, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@).

results.title: The effects of calcium-vitamin D and metformin on polycystic ovary syndrome: a pilot study.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: The effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and calcium-vitamin D in regulating the menstrual cycle suggest that they could also be effective for the treatment of @DISEASE_Anovulation @DISEASE_MESH:D000858 @@@anovulation@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Oligomenorrhea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009839 @@@oligomenorrhea@@@, with possible consequences for pregnancy rates in @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Rashidi B, Haghollahi F, Shariat M, Zayerii F. The effects of calcium-vitamin D and metformin on polycystic ovary syndrome: a pilot study. Taiwan J Obstet Gynecol. 2009 Jun;48(2):142-7. PMID: 19574176

results.title: Therapeutic response to metformin in an underweight patient with polycystic ovarian syndrome.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@PATIENT@@@(S): A 19-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ with a body mass index of 16.9 kg/m(2), severe @DISEASE_Hirsutism @DISEASE_MESH:D006628 @@@hirsutism@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Oligomenorrhea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009839 @@@oligomenorrhea@@@. INTERVENTION(S): @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@Insulin@@@ sensitization with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Effects of metformin on clinical and biochemical parameters in polycystic ovary syndrome.
results.text_hl: Baseline characteristics (menstrual history, @DISEASE_Hirsutism @DISEASE_MESH:D006628 @@@hirsutism@@@ scoring, @DISEASE_Acne_Vulgaris @DISEASE_MESH:D000152 @@@acne@@@ grading, body mass index [BMI], serum luteinizing hormone and follicule-stimulating hormone [LH/FSH] ratio, @CHEMICAL_Testosterone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013739 @@@testosterone@@@,fasting @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@/@GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ index) were assessed initially and 6 months after @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy. Three groups were constructed on the basis of menstrual symptoms: @<m>DISEASE_Oligomenorrhea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009839 @@@oligomenorrhea@@@ (group I), @DISEASE_Amenorrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D000568 @@@amenorrhea@@@ (group II) and @DISEASE_Menstruation_Disturbances @DISEASE_MESH:D008599 @@@hypomenorrhea@@@ (group III).

results.title: Comparison of clomiphene citrate, metformin, or the combination of both for first-line ovulation induction and achievement of pregnancy in 154 women with polycystic ovary syndrome.
results.text_hl: Group 2 (57 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@) received 500 mg of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ 3 times a day.

results.title: Role of metformin in correcting hyperinsulinemia, menstrual irregularity and anovulation in polycystic ovary syndrome.
results.text_hl: Our Objective was to observe the role of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in correcting @<m>DISEASE_Oligomenorrhea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009839 @@@oligomenorrhea@@@/@DISEASE_Amenorrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D000568 @@@amenorrhea@@@ and @DISEASE_Anovulation @DISEASE_MESH:D000858 @@@anovulation@@@ within six month in @DISEASE_Congenital_Hyperinsulinism @DISEASE_MESH:D044903 @@@hyperinsulinemic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@.
